body_html: We don't want to make load_state_dict do any pattern matching for DataParallel keys, because that would complicate the contract. We've thought about this a few times, but always concluded that we prefer the way it is right now. Thanks for the proposal!

body: We don't want to make `load_state_dict` do any pattern matching for DataParallel keys, because that would complicate the contract. We've thought about this a few times, but always concluded that we prefer the way it is right now. Thanks for the proposal!
